description:
Great piece of software, works well but I keep getting errors on my flatpack update because the project has been abandoned

Info: org.gnome.Platform is end-of-life, with reason: The GNOME 3.34 runtime is no longer supported as of 14th August 2020. Please ask your application developer to migrate to a supported platform.

sudo flatpak list --app --app-runtime org.gnome.Platform//3.34
Name      Application ID                Version    Branch    Installation
VServer     com.github.bcedu.valasimplehttpserver     1.3.5     stable    system
Doesn't work for most linux distributions
